formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \text{CAGR} = \left(\frac{\text{Final Value} + \text{Income} - \text{Costs}}{\text{Initial Investment}}\right)^{\frac{1}{t}} - 1 \quad \text{where } t \text{ is time in years}
formulas.raw: \text{CAGR} = \left(\frac{\text{Final Value} + \text{Income} - \text{Costs}}{\text{Initial Investment}}\right)^{\frac{1}{t}} - 1 \quad \text{where } t \text{ is time in years}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Net profit \[ \text{Net Profit} = \bigl(\text{Final Value} + \text{Income} - \text{Costs}\bigr) - \text{Initial Investment} \] Return on Investment (ROI) \[ \text{ROI}(\%) = \frac{\text{Net Profit}}{\text{Initial Investment}} \times 100 \] Annualized ROI (CAGR) \[ \text{CAGR} = \left(\frac{\text{Final Value} + \text{Income} - \text{Costs}}{\text{Initial Investment}}\right)^{\frac{1}{t}} - 1 \quad \text{where } t \text{ is time in years} \] Break-even final value (ROI = 0) \[ \text{Break-even Final} = \text{Initial Investment} + \text{Costs} - \text{Income} \] Multiple on Invested Capital (MoIC) \[ \text{MoIC} = \frac{\text{Final Value} + \text{Income} - \text{Costs}}{\text{Initial Investment}} \]

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ \text{Net Profit} = (\text{Final Value} + \text{Income} - \text{Costs}) - \text{Initial Investment} \] \[ \text{ROI}(\%) = \frac{\text{Net Profit}}{\text{Initial Investment}} \times 100 \] \[ \text{CAGR} = \left(\frac{\text{Final Value} + \text{Income} - \text{Costs}}{\text{Initial Investment}}\right)^{1/t} - 1 \] \[ \text{Break-even Final} = \text{Initial} + \text{Costs} - \text{Income} \]

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
